verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Thou my everlasting Portion, More than friend or life to me, All along my pilgrim journey, Savior, let me walk with Thee

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Close to Thee, close to Thee, Close to Thee, close to Thee; All along my pilgrim journey, Savior, let me walk with Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Not for ease or worldly pleasure, Not for fame my prayer shall be; Gladly will I toil and suffer, Only let me walk with Thee.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: Close to Thee, close to Thee, Close to Thee, close to Thee; Gladly will I toil and suffer, Only let me walk with Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Lead me through the vale of shadows, Bear me o’er life’s fitful sea; Then the gate of life eternal May I enter, Lord, with Thee.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines: Close to Thee, close to Thee, Close to Thee, close to Thee; Then the gate of life eternal May I enter, Lord, with Thee.
